name: Kick-Ass: The Game
description:
Kick Ass Patch 1.03 is a New and Improved Game throughout all game play levels. Kick Ass is a fully 3rd person action game where the player can play and control modern day Superheroes based on the supercharacters found in the film. This game is an action combat game where Superheroes, finally sick of the crime around them, will now do something about it. Players get to play as the movie's three primary characters --- Kick Ass, Hit Girl, or Big Daddy. True to the intellectual property, the game features visceral combat, plenty of gore, and an interesting story that utilizes a combination of cynical realism and anti-hero satire.

New Game Play features Include:
1. Brand New game play level "Nightclub" featuring Red Mist.
2. New Fighting moves throughout the game for each superhero
ex. Double Hit Spin Attack, Horizontal Smash Attack, Toss Attack (Team Move).
3. New Finisher Moves
4. New AI improvement through entire game.
5. Trophy Glitch Fixed
6. New Music Soundtrack
